attributes.action: Get on with Brexit. Stop the Ben Act!
attributes.additional_details:
Any further delays in BREXIT will only create uncertainty. British business owners and investors are being hurt financially due to the delay.

We need to Stop the negative approach and be positive in our BREXIT.

Over 17 Million voted in favour of leaving the EU.

Why do a few MP's think their views are stronger than the British voters?
attributes.background:
As a democratic country BREXIT needs to happen. Too many obstructions are being put in our Prime ministers way. 

We all want BREXIT to happen on the 31st of October. 

Parliament is becoming a joke. The British people are not laughing!

No more delays for BREXIT
